description: # GlassiFy 2.0 — Release Notes **Version:** v2.0.2511 **Release date:** November 30, 2025 **Status:** Stable We are excited to introduce GlassiFy v2.0! This major release transforms the library from our unique frosted liquid glass utility into a full Liquid Glass Rendering Engine with both GlassiFy's Super Frosted Liquid Glass effect and Traditional Liquid Glass effect inspired by Apple Design. Now you can use both effects, and the new traditional liquid glass effect increases performance by 200%. ### ✨New Features - **Dual Rendering Modes:** - **Default (New):** Traditional Liquid Glass effect inspired by Apple Design. (More performance, best for mobile development) - **Super:** GlassiFy's Unique Super Frosted Liquid Glass effect. - **Easy Switch:** Very easy to switch between modes using `mode` attribute. - **New Official CDN:** Our official CDN enables you to specify a version or just get the latest version with our official CDN url. ```html ``` ### ⚡Improvements - **Framework Agnostic:** Now fully compatible with React, Vue, and Angular without additional wrappers. - **Performance:** Comes with default well optimized mode. - **Bug Fixes:** Fixed bugs appears when customizing effect. ## Default Mode ## Super Mode
